name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
description: Your family will love this easy-to-make meal.

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs

preparation: Add oil to Wok and heat over medium-high. Add chicken and stir-fry for approximately 3-5 minutes. Remove from Wok and set aside.
Add broccoli and stir-fry until tender-crisp. Return chicken to Wok. Pour in Ultimate Asian Sauce and add pineapple. Bring to a boil and stir constantly until sauce thickens.
tips: Chow mein is a stir-fried dish (typically featuring meat and vegetables) in a soy-based sauce served with crispy noodles. “Chow mein” this recipe by dishing it up with a package of store-bought crispy noodles. If you use soft noodles, the dish is called “lo mein.”

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavor with a mild heat from cayenne.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice and noodle dish.
